course_description: This course combines advanced textbook-based instruction with various genres of Arabic literature. Students will practice the four skills of listening, speaking, reading and writing, with particular emphasis on written expression. All class activities will be conducted in Arabic.
sections: Class Nbr: 2304, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: R. Cornell, Status: Open
